content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Coal Mine at position (43.0, -82.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner Mining Drill (position (43.0, -82.0)) 
- Furnace (position (41.0, -82.0))
- Chest (position (42.5, -83.5))
- Burner Inserter (position (43.5, -80.5))
- Chest (position (43.5, -79.5))
- Chest (position (44.5, -81.5))
- Chest (position (45.5, -80.5))

### ERROR TIPS
### Errors when trying to smelt without ingredients
- Ensure you have the necessary ingredients in your inventory before attempting to smelt.
### Errors when chest at drop position is full
- Empty the chest at the drop position to continue mining.
### Errors when out of fuel
- Insert coal into the drill to continue mining.
### Errors when inserter is waiting for source items
- Ensure the inserter has source items to pick up.
### Errors when trying to extract without items
- Ensure there are items to extract from the entity before attempting to extract.
